para.para: A collection of interfaces SyncObjects can implement.

listitem.para: Generic handlers for routing incoming network messages as byte[] arrays to registered handlers.
A generic passthrough used to store Play/Crossfade/SetTrigger calls for deferment
Destroys they exist in the scene during startup.
This component will generate a hitscan based on the transform it is attached to.
A simple usable example of an IInventory system.
Extend this base class for derived SyncObjectTFrame to include networked variables.
Utility class that contains methods to create a unified argument string for calling all of the Raycast/Overlap cast calls.
Starting class for Generic Hitscan component implementation.
This is the inspector element for HitscanDefinition.
Extension of the HitscanType Enum for testing the type of cast/overlap being used.
Flags a ApplyOrder as adjustable in the inspector.
Indicates a class that can be added to an IInventory.
Base class for the inventory system.
An implementation of InventoryContactReactors<> that can be used as an inv
Interface indicates interest in knowing when there has been a change in which Vitals are owned by this connection.
Callback Interface for when all SyncObjects on a NetObj have indicated Ready and are prepared for the NetObj to become visible.
These callbacks are called by NetMaster to serialize data to the tick stream after the FrameId value, and before all NetObject data is written.
Flags a SyncObject as needing to recieve a complete frame or manually call netObj.SyncObjSetReady() before the netObj is flagged as ready.
Indicates component controls the spawning and despawning of an object.
Object contains a Vitals class reference.
Extend this class and define the overrides to produce a mask logic.
Base class for components that are aware of Networking and the root NetObject, and tie into its startup/shutdown/ownership callbacks.
A networkable representation of an object hit, from a collision, trigger or hitscan.
A reusable collection of NetworkHit that can be serialized.
Basic automatic transform mover for objects for network testing.
TODO: this class can become non-abstract if I finish it out and see reason for it.
Basic automatic transform mover for objects for network testing.
The base class of all Simple Sync networked components.
Base class of synced projectile/hitscan sources.
Automatically generates ChangeState events on the SyncState based on timers and triggers.
TODO: Make this a generic when working on .net versions that supports enum generic constraint.
Collection of Vitals with code to propagate damage and such from higher layers to lower layers.
Base class for Vital UI components that can find source.
enum RespondTo { HitSelf = 1 , IContactTrigger = 2 , HitNetObj = 4 , HitNonNetObj = 8 }
enum VitalType { None , Custom , Health , Armor , Shield , Energy , Mana , Rage }
enum FrameArrival { IsFuture = -1 , IsTarget , IsSnap , IsLate }
enum PassThruType { SetTrigger , ResetTrigger , Play , PlayFixed , CrossFade , CrossFadeFixed }
enum ObjState { Despawned = 0 , Visible = 1 , Mounted = 2 , AnchoredPosition = 4 , AnchoredRotation = 8 , Anchored = 12 , Dropped = 16 , Transit = 32 }
enum ObjStateEditor { Despawned = 0 , Visible = 1 , Mounted = 2 , AnchoredPosition = 4 , AnchoredRotation = 8 , Dropped = 16 , Transit = 32 }
enum KinematicSetting { Ignore , Default , NonKinematic , Kinematic }
enum AxisMask { None = 0 , X = 1 , Y = 2 , XY = 3 , Z = 4 , XZ = 5 , YZ = 6 , XYZ = 7 }
enum HitscanType { Raycast , SphereCast , CapsuleCast , BoxCast , OverlapSphere , OverlapCapsule , OverlapBox }
enum Replicate { None , CastOnly , Hits , HitsWithContactGroups }
enum FrameContents { Empty , Partial , NoChange , Extrapolated , Complete }
enum ContactType { Undefined = 0 , Enter = 1 , Stay = 2 , Exit = 4 , Hitscan = 8 }
